title: Share of boys achieving minimum proficiency in reading, by education level
subtitle: The share of children who achieve minimum [reading](#dod:reading-proficiency) proficiency at different education levels. At [primary](#dod:primary-education) level, children can identify key ideas in texts and connect them to their own experiences. At [lower secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) level, children can connect main ideas across different text types, understand the author's intentions, and draw conclusions from the text.
